topicTitle: How do you feel about me?

posts.postText: Idk its late... early? 1am normally wait till 3 am to do something stupid but im kinda tired, just thought id like to wake up to see how many people hate me :P
I seriously don't know who you are, but I have seen you around.... No opinion :3
Don't see you on the servers often but you're pretty active on the forums so that's good.

OMG I LOVE YOU <3 <3<3<3
